attributes.action: endorse the recommendations of the recent UKNDA report into the "crisis" facing our armed forces and to act accordingly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This month, the UK National Defence Association called for politicians to address the challenges facing the armed forces, specifically the need for extra investment in defence and a three-phase programme of reinvestment and rearmament.

These recommendations are outlined in the following report:

http://www.uknda.org/my_documents/my_files/OVERCOMING_THE_DEFENCE_CRISIS_Sep08.pdf
